mapper.select: select brid, brcontent, b_ref_bid, bruser, br_date, br_modify_date, br_status form b_reply r, board b where r.b_ref_bid = b.bid and brid = #{ brid} order by brid
select * from b_reply where brid = #{ brid }
mapper.insert: insert into b_reply values (seq_brid.nextval, #{ brcontent }, #{ b_ref_bid }, #{ bruser }, sysdate, sysdate, default)
mapper.update: update b_reply set brcontent = #{ brcontent }, br_modify_date = sysdate where brid = #{ brid }
update b_reply set br_status = 'N', br_modify_date = sysdate where brid = #{ brid }
